mapper.select: select tb.id, title, content, start_date, end_date, register_date, tb.updated_date, viewed_count, user_id,tu.name FROM trip_board tb join tbl_user tu on tb.user_id = tu.id order by tb.id desc

select tb.id, title, content, start_date, end_date, register_date, tb.updated_date, viewed_count, user_id,tu.name FROM trip_board tb join tbl_user tu on tb.user_id = tu.id where user_id = #{id} order by tb.id desc

select count(tu.id) from trip_board tb join tbl_user tu on tb.id = tu.id
and title like concat('%',#{keyword},'%')
and nickname like concat('%',#{keyword},'%')
and content like concat('%',#{keyword},'%')

SELECT tb.id, title, content, register_date, tb.updated_date, viewed_count, user_id,tu.nickname FROM trip_board tb join tbl_user tu on tb.user_id = tu.id
and title like concat('%',#{keyword},'%')
and nickname like concat('%',#{keyword},'%')
and content like concat('%',#{keyword},'%')
order by tb.id desc limit #{offset},#{rowCount};
